resources.string: The Warrior class is the buff and strong. Take lots of damage and mow down your enemies at close range ...
The Ranger class is the quick and no scoper. Avoid your enemies fire and pick them off from a distance ...
The Wizard class is the wise and social distancer. Use powerful shots, but mind your delicate constitution...
The Bard class is very annowing and very bad musician. Damage anyone any enemies within your range of attack...

Welcome to HuKin, the arena game. Within this game, your goal is to survive the waves of enemies that come at you for as long as possible. 

Instructions:
 	Movement: Simply tap where you want to go
 	 Attack: Your character will attack the closest enemy for you 

Just remember, keep an eye on your healthbar. In the arena, there is no way to heal ...
